definition: (of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
to burn incense and worship Buddha
(of a childless couple) to pray for a son/to try to have a child
to redeem a vow (to a deity)/to fulfill a promise/votive
to come true/to come about as predicted/to be fulfilled
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
acolyte in charge of incense in a temple
to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
